org.apache.jackrabbit.core.cluster
Class ClusterNode

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.core.cluster.ClusterNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, NamespaceEventChannel, NodeTypeEventChannel, RecordConsumer
public class ClusterNode
extends Object
implements Runnable, NamespaceEventChannel, NodeTypeEventChannel, RecordConsumer

Default clustered node implementation.

remapped in interface NamespaceEventChannel
Parameters:

newPrefix - new prefix. if null this is an unmap operation
uri - uri to map prefix to
